name: Desktop Demons
description:
Some Horrible Little Demons have invaded your Desktop Computer!

Remove them with your flyswatter before they find and devour the files that they are looking for. If they eat the right file they might escape!

Made by Silver Lewis, JohnLee Cooper, nymph, and luniris. A Bear Vegas Game.

Made for TOJam 2022, whose theme was "That Doesnt Belong There!"

P.S.

If you hold down your left click the flyswatter becomes a solid object. Maybe you can use that to.... help the little creatures?
